ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: May he be accursed, how he planned!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Ruin seize him, how did he hatch a scheme?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So accursed be he, how evilly did he decide!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So let him be cursed, how he plotted!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: But may he be cursed how he plotted;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: death seize him, how he determined!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and woe to him; how he plotted!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Perish he! How moliciously he devised!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And woe to him! How he plotted!-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So let him be cursed! How he plotted!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: death seized him, how was his determining!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: May he perish, how he analyzed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So may he be destroyed [for] how he deliberated.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [74:19] Perish he, may he be cursed and chastised, how he decided!, [perish he] whatever the nature of his decision may have been.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: ((Self) destroyed is he) cursed is he, (how he planned!) his saying about Muhammad (pbuh)
